article_title: R.I. Secretary of State A. Ralph Mollis announces run for lieutenant governor
article_text:
R.I. Secretary of State A. Ralph Mollis announces run for lieutenant governor

PROVIDENCE — Rhode Island Secretary of State A. Ralph Mollis confirmed he’s running for lieutenant governor on Monday, saying he would focus the office on the economy and work-force development issues if elected

article_metadata.author: KATHERINE GREGG and PHILIP MARCELO
